name: 馬肇石
objective: 本課程利用三學年四學期的時間，培養學生簡易法文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對法國文化的認識與興趣，提供學生法文的基礎知識（包括字母、讀音、語法等）。授課內容：1.個人（姓名、數字、身體重要部位、職業、年齡等），2.家庭（親屬稱謂、住宅式樣、個性、求學、介紹他人等），3.日常生活對話（打電話、道謝、道歉、討論天氣、討論日常活動、常用物品、約會、重要場所、用餐、提出邀請等）。
schedule: The French class is a beginners class. The book I will use is a famous French learning book called Tempo 1. This book cover the first and second years of learning. Classes will be divided between French grammar, French prononciation, French comprehension, French lecture. I use mostly the book but also different complementary texts, exercices, graphics, grammar lists. Also a prononciation system is introduced from the beginning and so each student can practice his/her prononciations. Students do not have homeworks but must practice and revise notions learned at each class.
scorePolicy:
class 1: simple presentation of yourself. Bonjour, salut.
class 2: verbs to be and to have, masculin/feminin. Numbers 1-10.
class 3: tu and vous. Numbers 10-20.
class 4: nationalities, masculin/feminin. Numbers 20-69.
class 5: Numbers 70-100. Telephone.
class 6: Professions, masculin/feminin.
class 7: Singular/pluriel. Languages.
class 8: vrai ou faux. Informations on a preson.
class 9: mid-term exam.
class 10: possessifs: mon, ton, son, etc...
class 11: texts different presentations p.27.
class 12: est-ce que/qu'est-ce que, questions.
class 13: p.28 Alice, Pierre et Marie, ils...
class 14: seasons, weather.
class 15: Months, prepare a meeting, dates and years.
class 16: the official and normal time, AM/PM. Train station.
class 17: the week, p.40 Dialo, breakfast.
class 18: final term exam.
materials:
Name: TEMPO 1, methode de francais
Author: Evelyne Berard, Yves Canier, Christian Lavenne
Publisher: Didier/Hatier
ISBN NO. 978-2-278-04423-8
